oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Rural areas; Country life; Rifles

Ganier, Albert Franklin, 1883-1973; York, Alvin Cullum, 1887-1964; Sergeant York (Motion picture); Tennessee -- Social life and customs; Appalachians (People) -- Tennessee; Rural families -- Appalachian region; Rifle practice
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Four men are sitting on the ground with targets and guns. Many more men appear in the background of the photograph, most carrying guns.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Albert F. Ganier
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Appalachian rifle shoot is a long-standing tradition that brings together riflemen both to showcase sharpshooting skills and function as a social gathering.
